actor_awards.notes: Scott received an In Memoriam Golden Boot Award in 1997 for his significant contribution to the Western genre. He was inducted into the Western Performers Hall of Fame in 1975. He has a Star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame at 6243 Hollywood Blvd.

filmography.title: Ride the High Country
filmography.role_description: An aging, morally compromised ex-lawman who plots to steal a gold shipment he has been hired to protect, serving as a foil to his principled old partner.
filmography.plot: Two aging lawmen, old friends who have taken different paths in life, are hired to transport gold from a mining camp to a bank, but their partnership is tested by greed and a young protege.

filmography.title: Seven Men from Now
filmography.role_description: A stoic, guilt-ridden former sheriff who relentlessly hunts the seven men responsible for a robbery that resulted in his wife's death.
filmography.plot: A former sheriff blames himself for his wife's death during a Wells Fargo robbery and vows to track down and kill the seven men responsible.

filmography.title: The Tall T
filmography.role_description: An easygoing but capable rancher who is taken hostage along with a wealthy newlywed couple by a trio of ruthless outlaws.
filmography.plot: After losing his horse in a bet, a rancher hitches a ride on a stagecoach carrying a wealthy heiress, only for the group to be hijacked by three killers.

filmography.title: Ride Lonesome
filmography.role_description: A bounty hunter who captures a killer not for the reward, but to use him as bait to lure the killer's brother out of hiding for a personal vendetta.
filmography.plot: A bounty hunter captures a wanted murderer and transports him to justice, knowing the killer's brother is in hot pursuit, but his true motives are personal.

filmography.title: Comanche Station
filmography.role_description: A loner who trades with Comanches to rescue a white woman, only to be joined by three outlaws who plan to kill him for the reward money.
filmography.plot: A man rescues a woman abducted by Comanches and escorts her home, accompanied by three untrustworthy outlaws who want the reward for themselves.

filmography.title: Buchanan Rides Alone
filmography.role_description: A West Texas drifter who rides into a corrupt border town and inadvertently gets caught in a war between the members of the ruling family.
filmography.plot: On his way home to Texas, a cowboy stops in a corrupt town controlled by the Agry family and is framed for murder, forcing him to play the family members against each other.

filmography.title: Decision at Sundown
filmography.role_description: A man consumed by vengeance who rides into a town to stop the wedding of the man he blames for his wife's suicide.
filmography.plot: A vengeful gunman arrives in a small town to kill the local boss on his wedding day, accusing him of ruining his wife's life years ago.

filmography.title: Western Union
filmography.role_description: A reformed outlaw who tries to go straight by working for the telegraph company, but is forced to confront his own brother who leads a gang of saboteurs.
filmography.plot: A former outlaw tries to leave his past behind by helping to string Western Union telegraph wires across the plains, but his outlaw brother stands in the way.

filmography.title: The Last of the Mohicans
filmography.role_description: The heroic colonial scout who tries to protect the daughters of a British colonel during the French and Indian War.
filmography.plot: During the French and Indian War, Hawkeye and his Mohican friends attempt to escort two British women through dangerous territory to their father's fort.

filmography.title: My Favorite Wife
filmography.role_description: A handsome, muscular vegetarian who was shipwrecked on a desert island for seven years with the protagonist's wife, sparking intense jealousy.
filmography.plot: A woman returns home after being stranded on a desert island for seven years, only to find her husband has just remarried and is very curious about the man she was stranded with.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nominated – Best Original Story, Best Score, Best Art Direction

filmography.title: Jesse James
filmography.role_description: A sympathetic marshal who is a friend of the James family and tries to bring Jesse in peacefully, ultimately marrying Jesse's widow.
filmography.plot: A highly romanticized account of the life of outlaw Jesse James, from his days as a farmer to his career as a bank and train robber.

filmography.title: The Spoilers
filmography.role_description: A corrupt gold commissioner in Nome, Alaska, who conspires to steal a rich mine from John Wayne's character.
filmography.plot: In Gold Rush-era Alaska, a prospector fights to save his claim from a corrupt gold commissioner and his crooked partners.

filmography.title: Hangman's Knot
filmography.role_description: A Confederate officer who unknowingly leads his unit to attack a Union gold shipment after the war has ended, and must deal with the moral fallout.
filmography.plot: Confederate soldiers rob a Union gold shipment only to learn the war ended a month ago, and are then besieged by a posse of drifters who want the gold.

filmography.title: Abilene Town
filmography.role_description: The tough town marshal of Abilene who tries to keep the peace between cattle drovers and homesteaders in the post-Civil War era.
filmography.plot: A town marshal in Kansas is caught in the middle of a violent conflict between cattlemen who want open range and farmers who want to fence the land.

filmography.title: Colt .45
filmography.role_description: A gun salesman whose new sample pistols are stolen by a killer, forcing him to hunt the man down to retrieve the dangerous weapons.
filmography.plot: A gun salesman tracks down a ruthless killer who stole two prototype Colt .45 repeating pistols and is using them to terrorize the territory.

filmography.title: Carson City
filmography.role_description: A railroad engineer hired to build a line through the mountains to Carson City, facing opposition from bandits who want to keep robbing stagecoaches.
filmography.plot: An engineer fights sabotage and bandits while trying to build a railroad to transport gold bullion safely from the mines of Nevada.

filmography.title: The Bounty Hunter
filmography.role_description: A professional bounty hunter hired to find three train robbers hiding in a small town with new identities.
filmography.plot: A bounty hunter is hired by the Pinkertons to track down three fugitives who have been hiding in a town for a year with stolen loot.

filmography.title: The Stranger Wore a Gun
filmography.role_description: A former spy for Quantrill's Raiders who tries to escape his past but gets pulled into a gold heist scheme in Arizona.
filmography.plot: A former spy moves to Arizona to join a gold robbery, but when he arrives he decides that the criminal life is not for him and tries to go straight.

filmography.title: Ten Wanted Men
filmography.role_description: A cattleman who tries to govern his territory with benevolent rule but is forced into violence when a rival hires gunmen to take over.
filmography.plot: A rancher tries to establish law and order in Arizona but ends up in a war with a rival who has hired a gang of gunfighters.

filmography.title: A Lawless Street
filmography.role_description: A weary town marshal dedicated to cleaning up Medicine Bend who faces assassination attempts and the return of his estranged wife.
filmography.plot: A marshal tries to keep the peace in a lawless town while trying to stay alive long enough to reconcile with his visiting wife.

filmography.title: Follow the Fleet
filmography.role_description: A sailor who romances Harriet Hilliard's character while his buddy (Fred Astaire) dances with Ginger Rogers.
filmography.plot: Two sailors on shore leave in San Francisco romance a singer and her sister while trying to save a sailing ship.

filmography.title: Roberta
filmography.role_description: An American football player who inherits a fashionable dress shop in Paris and falls in love with the head designer.
filmography.plot: An American football player inherits a Paris fashion house and falls in love with the designer, while his friend entertains with song and dance.

filmography.title: Gung Ho!
filmography.role_description: The dedicated commander of the 2nd Marine Raider Battalion who leads his men on a daring raid on Makin Island.
filmography.plot: During World War II, a special battalion of volunteers is formed to raid Japanese-held islands in the Pacific.

filmography.title: Return of the Bad Men
filmography.role_description: A rancher who agrees to become a federal marshal to fight a massive gang of famous outlaws terrorizing the Oklahoma territory.
filmography.plot: A rancher reluctantly takes a job as a marshal to stop the Sundance Kid, the Dalton Gang, and the Younger Brothers from overrunning the territory.

filmography.title: Virginia City
filmography.role_description: A Confederate officer running a gold smuggling operation to save the South, engaging in a battle of wits with a Union spy.
filmography.plot: A Union officer escapes a Confederate prison and heads to Nevada to stop a shipment of gold intended to support the Confederate war effort.

filmography.title: She
filmography.role_description: An explorer who discovers a hidden civilization in the Arctic ruled by an immortal queen who believes he is her reincarnated lover.
filmography.plot: Explorers find a hidden land in the Arctic ruled by an immortal queen who believes one of them is her long-lost love returned to her.
